string.name: name
string.value: The Shadow Knight's Request for Help
#p9201144# in #m683010000# needs your help. Go to #m683010000# via the Dimensional Mirror and talk to #p9201144#.
#p9201144# says that he is in need of a Twin Dragon's Egg and asks you to bring one back for him. You'll have to be quick before the mother dragon returns to the nest!

You've brought back a Twin Dragon's Egg for #p9201144#. He thanks you and tells you that you can gain precious treasures from the Twin Dragon's Egg by using a special Incubator found in the Cash Shop.

string.name: summary
string.value: Bring back a Twin Dragon's Egg from Dragon's Nest.
I guess you couldn't get me a #b#t4032639##k yet. The #p9201145# is at the very top of Dragon's Nest. Climb up the rope over there and get my one #t4032639#.
